snippet: Documents in a legal battle between Chevron and Ecuadoreans over damage to the Amazon rain forest show contacts between lobbyists and then-Attorney General Andrew M. Cuomo.
lead_paragraph: Documents in a legal battle between Chevron and Ecuadoreans over damage to the Amazon rain forest show contacts between lobbyists and then-Attorney General Andrew M. Cuomo.

headline.main: Ex-Aide Said She Drew Cuomo, as Attorney General, Into Rain Forest Case
headline.print_headline: Ex-Aide Said She Drew Cuomo, as Attorney General, Into Rain Forest Case
headline.seo: Documents in Chevron Suit Show Lobbyist’s Contacts With Cuomo
